reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 587/06: PRESCRIBED MATTERS - SUBSECTION 15 (5) OF ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 587/06: PRESCRIBED MATTERS - SUBSECTION 15 (5) OF ACT

content.content: 1. The following matter is prescribed for the purposes of subsection 15 (5) of the Act: 1. Any matter with respect to which a by-law could have been passed under the Act, other than sections 8 and 11, as it read on the day before section 11 of Schedule A to the Municipal Statute Law Amendment Act, 2006 came into force. O. Reg. 587/06, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following matter is prescribed for the purposes of subsection 15 (5) of the Act:

1. Any matter with respect to which a by-law could have been passed under the Act, other than sections 8 and 11, as it read on the day before section 11 of Schedule A to the Municipal Statute Law Amendment Act, 2006 came into force. O. Reg. 587/06, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 587/06, s. 2. Français
content.raw_html:
2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 587/06, s. 2.

Français
